body_html: I would also very much like to see fft support, not for the training of dnn models, but for the feature extraction in a speech recognition pipeline. In this case only r2c, 1d would be required, preferably with batching both in cpu and gpu.
body_text: I would also very much like to see fft support, not for the training of dnn models, but for the feature extraction in a speech recognition pipeline. In this case only r2c, 1d would be required, preferably with batching both in cpu and gpu.
body: I would also very much like to see fft support, not for the training of dnn models, but for the feature extraction in a speech recognition pipeline. In this case only r2c, 1d would be required, preferably with batching both in cpu and gpu.
